title: Threw Down My Enemy (6U36)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing Gandalf strength -1 for each wound on each character in the skirmish.
Lore:	”'…he fell from the high place and broke the mountain-side where he smote it in his ruin.'”
Rarity:	U
